titles.title: Point Spencer Land Conveyance Act

A bill to provide for the retention and future use of certain land in Point Spencer, Alaska, to support the mission of the Coast Guard, to convey certain land in Point Spencer to the Bering Straits Native Corporation, to convey certain land in Point Spencer to the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.
Point Spencer Land Conveyance Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Point Spencer Land Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to convey the surface and subsurface estates of Tracts 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 as identified on the map titled "Point Spencer Land Retention and Conveyance Map," dated January 2015, to the Bering Straits Native Corporation and tract 6 surface and subsurface estates to Alaska in accordance with specified terms.
The Port Coordination Advisory Council for the Port of Point Spencer is established.
